t: What any brand can learn from Marvel Studios | by Huy Hoang | Medium
s: March 30, 2022 - Every successful brand has a visionary behind the wheel. Someone who is a driving force, a key decision maker, has the ability to look light years ahead, and not only see the big picture, but is also involved in the little details. Amazon has Jeff Bezos. Marvel Studios has Kevin Feige.
